specs.label: Chassis
specs.value: 4130 Chromoly Tube Chassis: cut, bent and welded in house.

specs.label: Drivetrain
specs.value: CVT Transmission & 8.2-1 Reduction Gearbox with a RWD to AWD dogbox shifter.

specs.label: Suspension
specs.value: Custom SuperShox springs and rear load bearing axle.

specs.label: Brakes
specs.value: 3 Hayes brakes, with a dual master cyclinder & a single rear inboard brake.
